name: Life Simulator (itch)
description:
Welcome To Life Simulator!

A very simple game to simulate your lifestyle!

In the game's current state, it is very small and very slim when it comes to features. Clicking on certain objects executes certain actions.* Also, pressing 'Space' brings up the in-game menu.

CREDITS:
All rooms and vehicles are designed by freepik.
Music provided by NoCopyrightSounds.

*Since the game is compiled/packaged in Flash and Created using Scratch, some features may be broken or unstable. These will be fixed in the future.
